org.pmedv.util
Class DocumentBuilder

java.lang.Object
  org.pmedv.util.DocumentBuilder

public class DocumentBuilder
extends java.lang.Object

Static helper class for document generation with Apache FOP

For further documentation visit the apache FOP site

Author:
Matthias Pueski

Method Detail

createDocument

public static void createDocument(java.lang.String html,
                                  java.lang.String outputFormat,
                                  java.lang.String xslLocation,
                                  java.io.OutputStream out)

Converts an html string to a FOP processed document and writes it to the given OutputStream

If you want to create a pdf document and need to write it to a servlet OutputStream you might call for example:

DocumentBuilder.createDocument(html, MimeConstants.MIME_PDF, xslLocation, response.getOutputStream());

Parameters:
html - The input as html string
outputFormat - the output format @see MimeConstants
xslLocation - the absolute location of the XSLT stylesheet
out - the OutputStream to write to

applyXsltTransform

public static void applyXsltTransform(java.lang.String xslLocation,
                                      java.lang.String document,
                                      java.io.OutputStream out)
Applies an xslt transform based on a given document and an XSLT-stylesheet

Parameters:
xslLocation - the location of the stylesheet
document - the document to be transformed
out - the output to write to

xslLocation - the location of the stylesheet
